response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This remarkable item holds significant value to me, representing years of dedication and innovation. Given its importance to my business and personal endeavors, I am considering offering it to you at a special price. My proposal is to extend this extraordinary product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this figure strikes a balance between reflecting the true worth of the product and allowing you to secure an exceptional deal. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 1200000}
